name: Rubio by San Polo
serverNotes:
üìñ ABOUT: (sanpolomontalcino.com) Modern Super Tuscan from San Polo in Montalcino - same terroir as Brunello! Rated 91 pts by James Suckling. Also available by the glass.

üç∑ STYLE: Full-bodied Super Tuscan | Dark fruit, spice & oak | Well-structured tannins | Modern Tuscan winemaking | Age-worthy complexity.

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Red meats, grilled steaks, aged cheese, hearty pasta, bistecca.

üí° BOTTLE SERVICE: From a renowned Brunello producer at accessible price. Great introduction to Super Tuscan style!

name: "O'Lillo" by Baracchi
serverNotes:
üìñ ABOUT: (baracchiwinery.com) Approachable Super Tuscan from Baracchi estate. Sangiovese with international grapes. Also available by the glass.

üç∑ STYLE: Medium to full-bodied | Bright red fruit & soft tannins | Modern Tuscan style | Approachable, versatile.

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Grilled meats, pasta, pizza, Italian classics.

üí° BOTTLE SERVICE: Perfect introduction to Super Tuscan style. Bridge between traditional and modern!

name: "Ardito" by Baracchi
serverNotes:
üìñ ABOUT: (baracchiwinery.com) Premium Super Tuscan from Baracchi estate. Rated 93 pts by James Suckling. Step-up from O'Lillo with more structure and complexity.

üç∑ STYLE: Full-bodied Super Tuscan | Rich dark fruit, spice & oak | Concentrated, complex | Modern winemaking | Excellent aging potential.

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Bistecca Fiorentina, lamb, aged cheese, rich Italian dishes.

name: Tenuta San Guido "Le Difese"
serverNotes:
üìñ ABOUT: (tenutasanguido.com) From the legendary Sassicaia estate! 'Baby Sassicaia' Cabernet-Sangiovese blend. Rated 92 pts by Decanter.

üç∑ STYLE: Full-bodied Super Tuscan | Dark fruit & elegant structure | Classic Bolgheri terroir | Prestigious pedigree.

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Grilled meats, pasta, game, Italian classics.

üçæ DECANTING: Recommended 1-2 hours before serving to soften tannins and open up complex layers.

üí° BOTTLE SERVICE: Taste the famous Sassicaia terroir at an accessible price. Prestigious name, attainable bottle!

name: Antinori Tignanello
serverNotes:
üèÜ ABOUT: (antinori.it) Legendary Tignanello - the wine that INVENTED the Super Tuscan category in the 1970s! From 600-year-old Antinori family. Sangiovese-Cabernet blend.

üç∑ STYLE: Full-bodied icon wine | Dark fruit, spice & oak | Complex, age-worthy | Revolutionary Tuscan winemaking | Benchmark Italian wine.

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Bistecca Fiorentina, lamb, truffles, finest cuts.

üçæ DECANTING: Recommended 1-2 hours before serving to soften tannins and open up complex layers.

üí° BOTTLE SERVICE: Must-try for serious collectors. The wine that changed Italian winemaking forever!

name: Sassicaia
